sourcesContent:
import React, {useState,useEffect}from 'react' function Movies({searchMovie}) { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const getData = () => { fetch("movie.json") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((movies) => setData(movies)); }; useEffect(() => { getData(); }, []); return ( searchMovie==="" ?
{ data.map(el =>
{el.title}
{el.year} 9 / 10
) }
:
{ data.filter(el).map(el =>
{el.title}
{el.year} 9 / 10
) }
) } export default Movies
